GSP30timudghu:502_0: tathā bhrāmyati jīvākhyā & prāṇāprāṇākhyānokaje prāṇāprāṇasamāyukto & jīvo py eva
GSP30timudghu:502_1: hṛdi sthitaḥ śvāsani<śvās...> ... & puṇyapāpai samāyutaṃ antaryāmī śaktyā[-tā-nā-da-re-cā-ne-ca
GSP30timudghu:507: ..natāñ caiva & pa[n?/t]itāś ca viśeṣataḥ ajarāmarapadaṃ vyāptaṃ & labhate cakram āgataṃ
GSP30timudghu:511: tathaiva pūjaye nityaṃ & ātmānas tu vicakṣaṇaḥ
GSP30timudghu:514: tasya kaulam idaṃ divyaṃ & nirnnāśaṃ tu kadā cana{ḥ}
GSP30timudghu:516: ekam eva tu mūlasyā & śākhā tasya -m- anekadhā tasya mūlaprabhāvena & prarohaṃ sacarācaram ekabījan tu tattvasthaṃ & ekākārasamāsthitam vyāpakaṃ vyoma.peṇa & anantam vimala prabhuḥ
GSP30timudghu:519: svabhāve varttanirūpaṃ & svabhāve piṇḍamadhyamaḥ nitya[bha]vya sadā yogī & sādhaye piṇḍam
GSP30timudghu:520_0: ekāśramasamāyuktaṃ & ekasthānanivāsinī na pīṭhagamanañ caiva & na balikṣetram eva
GSP30timudghu:520_1: ca dehasthaṃ pīṭhakṣetre tu & nānyakṣetraṃ paryaṭate balivahniparaṃ yatra & tatrāsau
GSP30timudghu:521: kulādhāraṅ kulam pīṭha & akulaṃ kṣetrapālakaṃ na yoginīmelakañ caiva & na tu caryāvidhikramā
GSP30timudghu:523_0: na [dhyā]nayogapaṭṭāsaṃ & na yogadaṇḍadhāraṇam na keśavañcanañ caiva & muñjamekhalādikaṃ
GSP30timudghu:523_1: na kaupīnaṃ vrataṃ caiva & avyaktaliṅgavarjitaṃ na saṃdhyā agnikāryañ ca & na dravyaṃ
GSP30timudghu:524: dehasthan tu mahākuṇḍaṃ & jvalantattajamaṇḍalaṃ kālānalapratīkāśaṃ & vidyutkāntisamaprabhaḥ
GSP30timudghu:529: varjanā vā prayatnena & ekākārapadāsthitam sarveṣāṃ ta...
GSP30timudghu:532: mahāmārga yadā dṛṣṭvā & sarvatattva na saṃśayaḥ
GSP30timudghu:534_0: etat kaulam idaṃ divyaṃ & śivaśaktisamanvitam siddhāś ca yoginī caiva & sarvapīṭhasamāśṛtāḥ
GSP30timudghu:534_1: pūjayet kulamārgeṇa & vyomasthitayena vyāptaṃ samanuprāptam idaṃ divyaṃ & yat kulaṃ
GSP30timudghu:534_2: pīṭham uttamam na tasya yantramantrāṇi & nakṣatramantrasādhane sa paśyate samarasaṃ
GSP30timudghu:534_3: & vāṅmayaṃ sacarācaram samatvā vītarāgan tu & udāsī śāntacetasā %
GSP30timudghu:535: tathā vaktravinirmuktaṃ & gurubhakti samāhitaṃ samaya pālayen nityaṃ & ekākārapadāsthitaṃ tadātmakaulam āyānti & nirvāṇaṃ padavāpnuyāt %em: nirvāṇaṃ padam āpnuyāt
GSP30timudghu:536: tāñ ca acchayā yogī & nirācārapade sthitaṃ sa mukti sarvatattveṣu & mukti saṃsārabandhanāt ajarāmarapadaṃ vyāptaṃ & tadā mukti na saṃśayaḥ
GSP30timudghu:537_0: divya[pi]<ṇḍo>[\fol 47v] bhaved yogī & valīpālitavarjitaḥ paryaṣṭanti gaganābhogā
GSP30timudghu:537_1: & sadevāsuramānuṣāṃ % em: paryaṭati na punaḥ badhyate teṣām & padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GSP30timudghu:537_2: etan tu vimalan divyam & paśūnān timirāpahaṃ jñātavyaṃ siddhakaulaṃ tu & siddhanāthena
GSP30timudghu:537_3: bhāṣitam na candraravimadhyasthaṃ & na vahnipavanaṃ tathā
GSP30timudghu:538_0: upadeśena taṃ gamya & guruvaktre vyavasthitaṃ avikalpaṃ na gṛhīta & śrīmukhena vinirggataḥ
GSP30timudghu:538_1: ananta<ṃ> vimala<ṃ> śānta<ṃ> & hetulakṣaṇavarjitaḥ kathitaṃ mīnanāthena & etad yoga<ṃ>
GSP30timudghu:539: bhairava uvāca na nābhihṛdaye caiva & na kaṇṭhenaiva tāluke
GSP30timudghu:540: nan lalāṭe varārohe & ghaṇṭikāgre na vidyate
GSP30timudghu:541_0: brahmarandhrapravāhena & na mokṣ naiva sādhane dvādaśānte na cittasya & dvitā** na
GSP30timudghu:541_1: bhāvanam manasā tattva*yeṇa & na mokṣa na ca vidyate buddhinetra bhavet kiñ ci &
GSP30timudghu:544: malamālā tathā varṇṇa & jīvaśakti varānane uccāraye...
GSP30timudghu:545: ...rvatattvarūpeṇa & teṣāṃ mokṣo na vidyate yā sā granthi mahābhāge & jñānarūpaparāparaṃ jñātvā granthi mahādevi & anyajñāna...
GSP30timudghu:546: cakṣu[ḥ]śrotraṃ tathā ghrāṇa & vaktra gṛhya sadorgatiḥ
GSP30timudghu:547: nāḍī divya sureśāni & jñatvā vyāptaṃ sacarācaraṃ
GSP30timudghu:549: varjayet tāni devi & yadi -m- iccha siddhim uttamam % em: vārjayet tāni tu
GSP30timudghu:552: na cetā na jaḍāś caiva & nātm<ā> paras tathā{ś} caiva
GSP30timudghu:553: bharitāvasthāsampūrṇṇa&sarvvajñena śrīdhāriṇī na śūnyaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ & na dūre nāpi madhyame
GSP30timudghu:554: bharitāvasthāsampūrṇṇa&sarvvajñena śrīdhāriṇī na dehe gagane nāpi & lolībhūte naiva ca
GSP30timudghu:555_0: eta yat ka ci nirmuktaṃ & sāvasthā kaulikā gatā % em: kaulikā matā [\fol 48v] etāvasthā
GSP30timudghu:555_1: parityajya & pūrṇṇāvasthā mahāsukha bharitāvasthāmantrās tu & yo janāti sa kaulikaṃ
GSP30timudghu:595: jīvo py eva yadā devī & puṇyapāpais tu veṣṭita<ḥ>
GSP30timudghu:597: ...ccāryaśivo devī & likhyate na ca paṭhyate puṭadvayaviniṣkrānte & vāyu putra pralīyate
GSP30timudghu:598: sa muktita<ḥ> paraṃ brahma & taṃ śiva<ṃ> paramam padam mukhāgre yaḥ [pa]ramaṃ sūkṣmaṃ & dṛśyate vyomamadhyayaṃ %em
GSP30timudghu:601: tas tu saṃsthaṃ mana kṛtvā & ta dhyāyasva varānane
GSP30timudghu:602: sa śivas tu **rtti & sa mokṣamokṣadaṃ śvase
